statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM insurance_payments;
SELECT property_owner_id, insurance_policy_id, payment_amount FROM insurance_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT insurance_policy_id, COUNT(*) AS number_of_payments FROM insurance_payments GROUP BY insurance_policy_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM insurance_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM insurance_payments WHERE property_owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT insurance_policy_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM insurance_payments GROUP BY insurance_policy_id ORDER BY total_payments DESC
SELECT * FROM insurance_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT property_owner_id, COUNT(*) AS num_payments FROM insurance_payments GROUP BY property_owner_id HAVING num_payments > 5
SELECT * FROM property_owners;
SELECT owner_name, property_address FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, property_address FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 3;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, property_address FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, property_address FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT owner_name, owner_id, property_address FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY owner_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments JOIN property_owners ON payments.owner_id = property_owners.owner_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT property_address, payment_amount FROM property_owners JOIN payments ON property_owners.owner_id = payments.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_type, policy_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_amount > 5000;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT policy_type, policy_amount, payment_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_type = 'Homeowners';
SELECT property_owner_id, owner_name, owner_email FROM property_owners WHERE owner_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE payment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_type FROM insurance_policies ORDER BY policy_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM Payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE property_owner_id = 1234;
SELECT * FROM PropertyOwners WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT owner_name, email FROM PropertyOwners ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, company_address FROM InsuranceCompanies WHERE company_name = 'ABC Insurance';
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT property_owner_id, COUNT(payment_id) AS total_payments FROM Payments GROUP BY property_owner_id;
SELECT p.owner_name, COUNT(pm.payment_id) AS total_payments FROM PropertyOwners p LEFT JOIN Payments pm ON p.property_owner_id = pm.property_owner_id GROUP BY p.owner_name;
SELECT ip.company_name, COUNT(po.property_owner_id) AS total_owners FROM InsuranceCompanies ip LEFT JOIN PropertyOwners po ON ip.company_id = po.company_id GROUP BY ip.company_name;

SELECT p.owner_name, po.email, py.policy_number, py.start_date FROM PropertyOwners p JOIN Policies py ON p.property_owner_id = py.property_owner_id JOIN Payments pm ON py.policy_number = pm.policy_number WHERE pm.payment_amount > 500 ORDER BY pm.payment_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT owner_name, property_address FROM property_owners WHERE property_owner_id = 3;
SELECT policy_name, policy_amount FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT company_name, company_address FROM insurance_companies WHERE company_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT property_owner_id, COUNT(*) FROM payments GROUP BY property_owner_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_id, policy_name, policy_type FROM policies WHERE policy_amount < 5000;
SELECT p.*, t.status FROM payments p JOIN transactions t ON p.payment_id = t.payment_id WHERE t.status = 'Complete';

SELECT po.owner_name, p.payment_amount, t.transaction_date FROM property_owners po INNER JOIN payments p ON po.property_owner_id = p.property_owner_id INNER JOIN transactions t ON p.payment_id = t.payment_id WHERE t.transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
